info.title: Headless Admin Workflow
info.description: A Java client JAR is available for use with the group ID 'com.liferay', artifact ID 'com.liferay.headless.admin.workflow.client', and version '4.0.39'.

workflowDefinitionName.description: The name of the instance's workflow definition.

additionalName.description: The user's additional name, which can be used as a middle name.

image.description: A relative URL to the user's profile image.

profileURL.description: A relative URL to the user's profile.

ObjectReviewed.description: The object/asset that the task's workflow is managing.

completed.description: A flag that indicates whether the instance is complete.

workflowDefinitionName.description: The name of the instance's workflow definition.

availableLanguages.description: A list of languages for which the role has a translation.

items.description: A list of languages for which the role has a translation.

dateModified.description: The last time any of the role's fields were changed.

workflowTaskId.description: The task associated with this workflow log.

completed.description: A flag that indicates whether the task is complete.

dateDue.description: The date the task should be completed by.

workflowDefinitionName.description: The name of the task's workflow definition.
